document_data.title: Saturday Morning Adventures
document_data.author: [[David M. Booher]] & [[Sam Maggs]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Saturday Morning Adventures''''' comics adaptation of ''Dungeons & Dragons'' is a four-issue series published by [[wikipedia:en:IDW Publishing|IDW Publishing]], part of their ''Saturday Morning Adventures'' line which also includes ''Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles'' and ''G.I. Joe''. The miniseries is written by [[David M. Booher]]  and [[Sam Maggs]], with art by [[George Kambadais]]. It follows the characters of the 1983–1985 [[w:c:dungeonsdragons:Dungeons & Dragons (TV series)|''Dungeons & Dragons'']] cartoon series.
document_data.Issues:

* ''[[Saturday Morning Adventures 2|Saturday Morning Adventures #2]]'': "Prisoner of the Deep, Part Two"
* ''[[Saturday Morning Adventures 3|Saturday Morning Adventures #3]]'': "Prisoner of the Deep, Part Three"
* ''[[Saturday Morning Adventures 4|Saturday Morning Adventures #4]]'': "Prisoner of the Deep, Part Four"
* ''[[Saturday Morning Adventures TPB|Saturday Morning Adventures TPB]]'': "Prisoner of the Deep
* ''[[Saturday Morning Adventures: Endless Summer|Saturday Morning Adventures: Endless Summer]]''
* ''[[Saturday Morning Adventures II 1|Saturday Morning Adventures II #1]]'': "Here There Be Pirates, Part One"
* ''[[Saturday Morning Adventures II 2|Saturday Morning Adventures II #2]]'': "Here There Be Pirates, Part Two"
* ''[[Saturday Morning Adventures II 3|Saturday Morning Adventures II #3]]'': "Here There Be Pirates, Part Three"
* ''[[Saturday Morning Adventures II 4|Saturday Morning Adventures II #4]]'': "Here There Be Pirates, Part Four"
* ''[[Saturday Morning Adventures II TPB|Saturday Morning Adventures II TPB]]'': "Here There Be Pirates
